internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier of this device that is used by the operators in reports, documentation or data annotation.

deviceType._instruction: Add the generic type of this device.

manufacturer._instruction: Add the private or industrial vendor (person or organization) that manufactured this device.

modelName._instruction: Enter the full name of this particular model as stated from the manufacturer.

modelIdentifier._instruction: Add any persistent identifier assigned to this device.

serialNumber._instruction: Enter the serial number of this device.

owner._instruction: Add all legal owners (person or organization) of this device.

inventoryNumber._instruction: Enter the institutional inventory number (if it differs from the internal identifier).

description._instruction: Enter a description of this device.

software._instruction: Add all software versions that can control this device.

deviceProperty._instruction: Add all non-changeable device properties for this device.
